The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it. The engulfed target is blinded, restrained, and
unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning
damage. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.
The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is grappled
(escape DC 14), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.
Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of
hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

name: Shambling Mound
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10
